Dear Mr. Harley:
I apologize for failure to acknowledge receipt of your
brochure proposing a plan for development of educational
broadcasting as an aid to better citizenship. I
studied your plan and think it has real merit.
At present. The Richardson Foundation's resources
are committed to other organizations to an extent
which makes it difficult for us to give favorable
consideration to many desirable undertakings.
I hope that some way may be found to enable you to
develop this idea to fruition.
Cordially yours.
Capus Waynick
Executive Vice President
